title: Angular Jasmine to Vitest Schematic
description: Refactors a Jasmine test file to use Vitest.

include.description: A path to a specific file or directory to refactor. If not provided, all test files in the project will be refactored.

fileSuffix.description: The file suffix to identify test files (e.g., '.spec.ts', '.test.ts').

project.description: The name of the project where the tests should be refactored. If not specified, the CLI will determine the project from the current directory.

verbose.description: Enable verbose logging to see detailed information about the transformations being applied.
